decks.notes: This Jeskai Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy involves utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan and Phlage to deal damage quickly, while also controlling the board with cards like Lightning Bolt and Static Prison. The deck also includes cards for card advantage and tempo like Expressive Iteration and Guide of Souls. With a mix of efficient creatures and versatile spells, this deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and secure victories in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of creatures and spells to quickly assemble a win condition without relying on traditional lands. Tameshi, Reality Architect and Fallaji Archaeologist help dig for key pieces, while Thundertrap Trainer and Hydroelectric Specimen provide additional support. The deck includes ways to protect its combo with Pact of Negation and Disrupting Shoal, as well as disruption with Jwari Disruption and Beyeen Veil. Ultimately, the goal is to utilize cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom to achieve a game-winning play.

This Modern Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature-based strategies, utilizing cards like Orcish Bowmasters and Amped Raptor to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to further enhance its aggressive game plan. In addition, the deck includes disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and removal in the form of Galvanic Discharge to control the board. The land base is optimized for consistent mana production, with a variety of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure smooth gameplay.

This deck focuses on utilizing Eldrazi creatures and mana ramp spells to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures. The key strategy involves ramping up mana quickly using cards like Ancient Stirrings and Eldrazi Temple, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Pithing Needle and Relic of Progenitus. Karn, the Great Creator is a versatile tool for shutting down opponent's artifacts and generating card advantage. The deck also includes synergistic cards like Blade of the Bloodchief and Malevolent Rumble to further dominate the battlefield.

The deck focuses on using a combination of creatures and spells to generate a high amount of mana quickly without relying on traditional lands. This mana is then used to power out powerful combo pieces like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom to win the game in a single explosive turn. Disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells and disruption cards is key to ensure the combo can be executed safely. The deck aims to win the game before the opponent can establish a strong board presence.

This Amulet Titan deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and utilizing Primeval Titan to search for key lands like Urza's Saga and The One Ring, which generate powerful synergies with Amulet of Vigor. The deck aims to create explosive plays by using various land recursion effects and powerful tutor spells like Summoner's Pact. With the ability to generate a large amount of mana and powerful land-based combos, this deck can overwhelm opponents and set up game-winning plays in a few turns.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Amped Raptor, supported by powerful removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The deck also utilizes synergies like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to control the board and push for damage. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah ensures a strong late-game presence. The deck also benefits from the versatility of cards like The One Ring and Jegantha, the Wellspring, providing additional options and flexibility in gameplay.

The deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with different abilities to create powerful combos for control and damage. By using cards like Chord of Calling and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician, players can search for and manipulate creatures on the battlefield to gain advantage. The deck also includes cards like Blood Artist and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to drain opponents' life points while generating value from sacrificing creatures. The toolbox aspect of the deck allows for flexibility and adaptability in various matchups, making it a versatile and strategic option in Modern 1 vs 1 games.
